pages.title: Left Mouse Button Tweaks
pages.text: These tweaks make working with Inventory screens much faster and more pleasant

pages.title: LMB: Holding an Item
pages.text: When you pick up an item with a left click $(l)and hold$() you will pick up any items of the same type that your cursor passes over as long as you continue to hold down the left mouse button.$(br2)If you hold down the shift key the items will instead be sent to your inventory if there is a matching item there.

pages.title: LMB: Empty Cursor
pages.text: If you hold down the shift key while pressing the left mouse button - any items your mouse cursor pass over will instead be sent to inventory if there is a matching item there.
